Package controllers

Class HomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.HomeController
  • public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller contains an action to handle HTTP requests to the application's home page.
    Author:
    Harman Preet Kaur, Manan Dineshbhai Paruthi, Yashwanth Gundlapally, Kevinkumar Patel

      • index

        public play.mvc.Result index​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        An action that renders an HTML page with a welcome message. The configuration in the routes file means that this method will be called when the application receives a GET request with a path of /.
        Parameters:
        Http - .Request Takes the Http request as a parameter
        Returns:
        Result Returns that will be used for rendering in view page
